sense.name: 资金， funds
sense.commentary: asum of money saved and made available for a particular purpose.
sense.examples:
建设资金 funds for construction.
流动资金 current funds.
积压国家资金 Let state funds lie idle.

sense.name: 资金, capital
sense.commentary: wealth, esp. money used to produce more wealth through investment or a new business.
sense.examples:
她资金投入不错，能靠获取的利息生活。 She invested well, and can live on the interest without touching the capital.
投入的资金数量惊人。 The capital sunk in it is fabulous in amount.
资金安排 capital arrangement.
